name: Quit (Immanent Death)
description:
WARNING

This game contains loud sounds and flashing screen effects.

Your only purpose is to not die. Navigate your surroundings and collect resources; food, water, and firewood. Fix the circuit breaker when the power goes out. Lock the door at night because there is no escape. The only way out is to quit.

How to Play

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space/Enter/Z - Action
  • Shift/Control = Sprint
  • Esc/P = Pause
  • Back = Exit

Special thanks to these beta testers

  • CyberXtronic
  • Vaskhar
  • theratsmackers

Version 1.0.1

  • Fixed a bug where some sounds didn’t play when player life reaches 0 because of other stats at 0
  • Fixed a bug where the player was able to evade the monster attack (now the player freezes in place)
  • Made some adjustments to the monster AI
